brief: Create a dark, modern, high-energy gaming channel landing page for 'UnityWolf Gaming'. The page must include: (1) A hero section with the title 'UnityWolf Gaming' and a bold gaming-themed tagline; (2) A placeholder logo image loaded from a constant string named LOGO_URL so the user can replace it easily; (3) Navigation bar with Home, About, Socials, Contact; (4) An About section describing the gaming channel; (5) A Social Media section with buttons for YouTube, Twitch, Instagram, and X/Twitter placed inside an element with id='social-links'; (6) A Contact section containing the email mailto:unitywolfgaming@example.com; (7) Neon accents, dark theme, responsive layout, and hover animations; (8) Entire output must be a single fully working HTML file with inline CSS and JavaScript.
